<page title>: Allen Bradley 2711 T6C8L1 B FRN 4 30 PanelView 600 Color Touch DH RS 232 Print | eBay
description: Allen-Bradley 2711-T6C8L1 PanelView 600 Color Terminal 6-inch, Touchscreen, DH+ Communication Port & RS-232 Printer Port, DC Power, Series B
miscellaneous: Broad range of terminal combinations to fit any operator interface application; Eight display combinations, from 3-inch to 10-inch, in color, grayscale or monochrome, each designed for minimal installation depth with maximum viewing angles; Keypad, touch screen, or keypad/touch screen combinations for convenient and flexible operator input; RS-232 printer port to print alarms, alarm lists, triggered messages, and triggered states of a multistate indicator; Field-replaceable backlights.
specifications: Display Area (WxH): 115 x 86 mm (4.54 x 3.4 in); Resolution: 320 x 234; Backlight: Field replaceable; Real-time Clock: Battery-back clock time stamps critical data; Application Software: PanelBuilder32; Application Memory: 190 K Application Runtime; 240 K Flash; ATA Memory Card: Supported; Input Voltage: 18-32V DC.
